actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination against any applicant for credit on the basis of the geographic location of the applicant's residence or the applicant's occupation or title.

summary.text: Amends the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination against any applicant for credit on the basis of the geographic location of the applicant's residence or the applicant's occupation or title.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to prohibit discrimination against any applicant for credit on the basis of the geographic location of the applicant's residence or the applicant's occupation or title.
